definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Thus in this period, the subject concerning two-party system and party competes becomes hot point.
sentences.chinese: 因而這一時期有關兩黨制和黨爭的話題成爲言論熱點。

sentences.english: But anti-China rhetoric is hot in Washington and among many state and local officials.
sentences.chinese: 反中國的言論在華盛頓各級官員中間此起彼伏。

sentences.english: We have freedom of speech to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 我們有言論自由，以證明這一點。

sentences.english: They were fighting for freedom of speech and freedom of assembly.
sentences.chinese: 他們在爲言論自由和集會自由而鬥爭。

sentences.english: The government tried to muzzle freedom of speech.
sentences.chinese: 政府試圖鉗制言論自由。

sentences.english: And we must also grapple with the issue of anonymous speech.
sentences.chinese: 我們還必須解決匿名發表言論的問題。

sentences.english: The first is freedom of speech and expression -- everywhere in the world.
sentences.chinese: 第一是在全世界任何地方發表言論和表達意見的自由。

sentences.english: He collected other sayings about Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 他收集了關於耶穌的其他言論。

sentences.english: The left-leaning La Repubblica said it was a "reckless comment."
sentences.chinese: 左翼的《共和報》稱這是“魯莽的言論”。

sentences.english: The opinions expressed are his own. This is the last of a five-part series.
sentences.chinese: 以上言論系作者本人，是五部分中的最後一部分。

sentences.english: The admonition was prompted by Bush's rebuke of how China stifles free speech and religion.
sentences.chinese: 這個警告是對布什指責中國遏制言論和宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: Anson Chan decried the comments by Tsang as a "provocation and personal attack".
sentences.chinese: 陳方安生譴責曾德成的言論是挑釁及人身攻擊。

sentences.english: His actions were not in consonance with his words.
sentences.chinese: 他的行爲與他的言論不一致。

sentences.english: The special-operations officer spoke more boldly.
sentences.chinese: 特戰官員的言論則更爲大膽。

sentences.english: His speech was a treasonous one.
Van Loon did not shy away from controversial statements.
sentences.chinese: 房龍並不迴避富有爭議的言論。
